Name: COLORIDER
About the game: COLORIDER is a game about an unknown hero who decided to challenge the forces of a mysterious sect located underground. Explore the mysterious structure and sweep away everyone who gets in your way. The game has 15 levels, a final boss, 4 types of weapons. COLORIDER is a 2D shooter with a top view whose task is to clear all the rooms from enemies and move to a new room, which in turn will bring you closer to the final of the game. Game Features: - Pixel graphics - Hero weapon upgrade system - Final Boss - Soundtrack
